welcome.title: Welcome to City Pulse
welcome.subtitle: Discover amazing events happening in your city. From concerts and festivals to workshops and exhibitions - never miss out on what's happening around you.

discover.title: Discover Events
discover.description: Find concerts, festivals, workshops, and more happening in your area. Stay updated with the latest events and activities.

favorites.title: Save Favorites
favorites.description: Keep track of events you're interested in and never miss out. Create your personal collection of must-attend events.

location.title: Location-Based
location.description: Find events near you with integrated maps and location services. Get directions and venue details instantly.

step1.title: Sign Up
step1.description: Create your free account in seconds using Google or email

step2.title: Search Events
step2.description: Browse and search for events in your city or area of interest

step3.title: Save & Attend
step3.description: Save your favorite events and get reminders so you never miss out

cta.title: Ready to explore what's happening in your city?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who discover amazing events every day.

event.signInToAddFavorites: Please sign in to add events to your favorites
event.favoritesUpdateFailed: Failed to update favorites. Please try again later.

auth.biometricRequirements: Requires a device with biometric sensors and HTTPS
auth.biometricRegisterDesc: Register your biometric data to enable quick login
auth.biometricLoginDesc: Use your fingerprint, face ID, or other biometric method to access your account
auth.biometricDataAccess: This will access your actual Google account data
auth.biometricRegisterError: Please login with Google first to register biometric authentication
auth.biometricAlreadyExists: This device already has biometric credentials for this account
auth.biometricNotFound: Biometric credential not found. Please register first.
auth.biometricSessionExpired: Session expired. Please login with Google again.
auth.biometricCredentialNotFound: No biometric credential found. Please register first.
auth.emailRegistrationSoon: Email registration will be available soon. Please use Google sign-in for now.
auth.authenticationFailed: Authentication failed. Please check your Firebase configuration.

profile.title: Profile
profile.biometricDescription: Use fingerprint, face ID, or other biometric authentication for quick and secure login
profile.biometricEnabled: Your device biometrics are linked to this account
profile.biometricNotSupported: Biometric authentication is not supported on this device
profile.biometricRequirements: Requires a device with biometric sensors (fingerprint, face ID) and HTTPS

favorites.title: My Favorites
favorites.addEvents: Start adding events to your favorites!
